messages.subject: Mito survivors from Serizawa's group
messages.msgSnippet: Of the group of men from Mito who followed Serizawa Kamo into Kyoto with Kiyokawa & Kondou s group, I know that Nimii Nishiki and Hirayama Gorou died.  Hirama
messages.messageBody:
Of the group of men from Mito who followed Serizawa Kamo into Kyoto with Kiyokawa & Kondou's group, I know that Nimii Nishiki and Hirayama Gorou died. Hirama Juusuke, who was with Serizawa & Hirayama when they were murdered, survived the attack. But what happened to him after that? And what about a Noguchi Kenji, who also was part of Serizawa's group and the Shinsengumi... what happened to him during all of this wiping out of the Mad Duck club? Anyone know? Help!

phil


---------------------------------
